website_summaries.verdict: If you don't need or like cooking with extra-large pans, this set is comprised of mid-sized pans that offer the same features as other sets by the brand.
pros: A 9 1/2-inch pan and square fry pan complete with lids, steam rack, fry basket and cookbook make this complete set a good choice for preparing mid-sized meals
cons: Some complained about food sticking after repeated use
This issue was noted more frequently with the fry pan than the deep pan

customer_reviews.title: I used it about 3 times before the food (eggs) ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it about 3 times before the food (eggs) started sticking and now the bottom is bowed up. I did what the instructions said, I never used a nonstick spray, and never over heated it or up it in water while hot. It's junk, I just wanted a true nonstick pan and this is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely horrible. It works as advertised for a month. Then all non-stick properties are nonexistent. I initiated a return and they told me I had to pay shipping to return it which added insult to injury.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: AND SCRATCHES EASILY WITH A BEEF BONE
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT IS CHEAPLY MADE, IS NOT NON -STICK WHEN IT COMES TO MEAT JUICES, AND SCRATCHES EASILY WITH A BEEF BONE. THE PANS MIGHT BE FINE FOR STEAMING, BUT EVEN WHEN USED PROPERLY AND CAREFULLY, DO NOT MATCH THE HYPE AND COMMERCIALS. I would not buy this proDuct again. BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for a cheap made pan that doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly to say this product is cheap and no good!! I followed the instructions, didn't use metal utensils and second time using saw some scratches and everything get stuck. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: javy4

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed about a great pan
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, but not good for frequent use. Our pans copper covering is coming off and we don't use metal utensils. Pretty upset about that as I thought that was one of the perks about this pan!! (It not peeling or chipping). Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K. Shartzer

customer_reviews.title: I cooked cheese like they do on the commercial and it worked once
customer_reviews.text: I was very hopefull that this product would perform as advertised. Unfortunately it did not. I cooked 3 eggs, one at a time and the third one stuck . I cooked cheese like they do on the commercial and it worked once. The coating is great for a short time then disappeared, very disappointing. I wish someone would produce a heavier version of this product that would not work and the coating would last. .
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bradley

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: everything sticks buy something else, I am tired of trying to make this work Oh, I found that water or cooking oil does not stick Please to not buy
customer_reviews.author: dan gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Things get burnet very easy. Very hard to clean right away these pots ...
customer_reviews.text: This pot sticks. Things get burnet very easy. Very hard to clean right away these pots must soak. Will be sending back for my money back. Nothing like the commercial states.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stuck on you
customer_reviews.text: the pan started to burn food which then stuck to its surface despite the claim made by producer. Then, to add injury to insult Amazon has closed its return window even though merchants of this product offer life time guarantees. Very disappointed by Amazon leaving their clients high and dry
customer_reviews.author: ukrauskopf

customer_reviews.title: STUUUUPID ME
customer_reviews.text: I was really STUPID.I bought 2 sets of these and some more skillets.Do they stick? YES YES they do. These things cost me a lot of money and started sticking bad after less than a month.They are total pieces of crap. Save your money for something better.These are not any good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item on February 2017. This product stinks. The pot is chipping off or just flaking off. The only thing that we think happen that we where making mash potatoes and using a handheld cake mixer. Listen these are all aluminum with a coating. I wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Fish51

customer_reviews.title: The pan bottoms not nearly as easy to clean after burned food
customer_reviews.text: The pan bottoms not nearly as easy to clean after burned food. It did not slide off clean and needed some scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This looked like a good set
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a good set, but the coating kept coming off even after washing the smaller pan. I had to return it. Disappointed. We have the round pans and they work fine, so I thought this would be the same quality. It also had an odd smell when I first opened the box. The round pans don't.
customer_reviews.author: musicfan

customer_reviews.title: Induction does not heat edges of pans
customer_reviews.text: I am using these pans on an induction cooktop in my RV. The pans only get hot where the steel induction ring is, leaving all four corners barely warm. I will use my Anolan induction cookware, it gets hot on the entire pan. If using the Copper Chef cookware on gas or electric I think they would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Norma J. Nabors

customer_reviews.title: This product is good for my steaming but the eggs stick
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for my steaming but the eggs stick, i dont know why they lie so much on TV you just cant trust anyone omg
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I didn't give them a 5 is
customer_reviews.text: It isn't as non-stick as shown on TV, but I do like the pans and I got them very quickly. Don't try to fry an egg without some butter or something. It will stick. Also, they do scratch if you don't use non-metal utensils. But that isn't a big deal for me because I got some great utensils and tongs right here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: The pans and accessories were all perfect, except for the lid
customer_reviews.text: just received this today. Was very excited to wash and use right away. The pans and accessories were all perfect, except for the lid. One side of the handle was not connected, bolted in. I do not feel it is necessary to pack up the whole set and return, however I would like a new lid. I will return the damaged one in exchange. That should be cheaper than replacing the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: The set is great! Would love to buy another. Seriously nothing has stuck to these pans...ever. Used them for a few months and everything has turned out great. We use these in a gas stove and haven't had any problems so far. No longer use oil to cook with...not needed! We even use them to reheat leftovers. No more microwave! Clean up is easy. Never have to let them soak. Like nice and not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. Lightweight. It'll chip and the bottom will discolor and look like it's erroding.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Brannen

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are none stick but if you burn ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and I did read the reviews ahead of time I ignored them. well there were right you have to learn to cook on low temps or it will ruin the pans. Although the free items don't use them they will melt and ruin the pans by staining it. I love that they are none stick but if you burn something in them it will stain the pan but nothing sticks. I only had the pans a few months and they look like I had them for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN ROSE

customer_reviews.title: They didn't have to be seasoned like some of the other copper pots
customer_reviews.text: These pots are really "no stick". You would think that the handles would get hot when cooking but they don't. I will only purchase these from now on. They didn't have to be seasoned like some of the other copper pots. Instructions for care are really easy to follow. Warm soapy water to clean up and make sure the pot is cool off completely before washing.
customer_reviews.author: koskat2167

customer_reviews.title: Flip or flop
customer_reviews.text: For all the praise for this product had it turns out to be a flop. It had great start that didn't last. The top edges of the pan are all scratched down to the metal. This boasted as non stick but I have started to have to use oil to obtain a non stick surface. I would highly recommend using a teflon spatula when cooking with this product. Definitely would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lakes medic

customer_reviews.title: They worked great for about 30 to 60 days then they were ...
customer_reviews.text: We had these for about a year and had to throw them away. They worked great for about 30 to 60 days then they were not really non stick anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I've treated these pans with great care because I've had ceramic coated pans before that ...
customer_reviews.text: I've treated these pans with great care because I've had ceramic coated pans before that scratch and chip easy. I don't stack them..I only use silicone tools with them.... but after only a few uses, I see small scratches on the outside of the pan and a small one on the inside already which is making me think they will not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: They liked it the first month
customer_reviews.text: Gave this is as a gift to my parents. They liked it the first month. It lost its non stick ability within the first month and also lost its color. Food doesn't cook as well and sticks to all the cookware. Hoping the company could give me a replacement or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment despite the hype
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the Copper Chef cookware is nowhere near as good as I had hoped. The thin aluminum pans are painted copper on the outside which is already scratched and wearing off after only a few uses. But more importantly, the nonstick interior surface started sticking after the first few uses despite pretreating the surface with oil as instructed. Also, the thin aluminum does not transfer heat evenly so food at the outside edges is barely cooked while the center is nearly burnt. I would not waste anymore money on this brand.
customer_reviews.author: WebfootInParadise

customer_reviews.title: You have to read the directions on how to care for copper pans
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought my fiancé the small pan for Christmas and we fell in love with these pans so for Valentine’s Day I made sure to get him the set! If you want your pans have a long lifetime you must read the directions and follow them! These pans are great and I can cook literally anything and it won’t stick. Mine didn’t have a chemical smell nor did they start to melt. Love these pans!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Warning ⚠️Get rid of all your other cookware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed by all of the negative reviews before purchasing this item but I went ahead and did it anyways because someone really wanted this item so I bought it for them for Christmas. They’ve since threw out all of their old cookware and I have found that most of the negative reviews stem from the fact that the item probably wasn’t taken care of properly as it gives specific care instructions. We’ve used this product multiple times and it stands behind its promise!
customer_reviews.author: Monique. R

customer_reviews.title: Really excited to purchase this set the price was good but after having and using a few times every ...
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to purchase this set the price was good but after having and using a few times every time I use it there is a chemical odor that emits from the pans and stinks up our entire home. I have stopped using them due to being worried the food cooked in them is not safe.
customer_reviews.author: zaba

customer_reviews.title: Paid way too much!
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I didn't like the price I paid for it. $30 dollars more than some other mail order companies charge, I found after I had already bought it. Shop around and beware.
customer_reviews.author: ariel rock

customer_reviews.title: They are both nice side pans and they are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Although these pans advertise to be non stick...stuff sticks to them. They are both nice side pans and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: smshookie

customer_reviews.title: Not quite non stick
customer_reviews.text: Overall I've been happy with this set. I won't fry an egg in it like the video I watched though. It stuck pretty good. I've also had sausage grease burn to the pan and I thought it was ruined, but a Mr Clean eraser saved the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen N

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, I made bacon cheese burger med well ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I made bacon cheese burger med well with barbecue sauce on the burgers and the sauce did not stick to the pan. the burgers came out perfect to my taste. Also the cleanup was very easy, a little dish soap and water and the pan was clean to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K

customer_reviews.title: In the beginning the worked great. With time & usage they do get scratched ...
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning the worked great. With time & usage they do get scratched up, like any other pan. Everything sticks & it is false advertisement to say that they last forever...they don't. I do not recommend you to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: no stick
customer_reviews.text: Most worthless set of cookware ever. DO NOT BUY. After a short use period, food started sticking. Did NOT put it in the dishwasher, and still sticks.
customer_reviews.author: l.colin

customer_reviews.title: I got this thinking what the advertising said not sticking ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking what the advertising said not sticking also no burning on any king of stove was true and is not the bottom of the pans are discolor and burn , can you please tell me if they can be replace????? this is my second order. You can contact me by E-mail or my cell 561-543-1678 Thank You
customer_reviews.author: roberto e. inesta

customer_reviews.title: Be extremely careful when repositioning this metalware. The outside ...
customer_reviews.text: Be extremely careful when repositioning this metalware. The outside surface is as slippery as the interior and it will slide right off a surface. My new set slid right off the oven rack with minimal force. Luckily nothing broke and I teceived only a mild burn, but a huge mess!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Blend

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I have been very happy with this product ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have been very happy with this product so far, Caution....gets hot real quick, so reduce your heat and pay attention. Nick S. Orange County, California
customer_reviews.author: Styno

customer_reviews.title: Not very "non stick"
customer_reviews.text: Eggs stuck horribly after the 3rd or so use. Even after soaking and a trip in the dishwasher I had to hand scrub them off.
customer_reviews.author: adam pottebaum

customer_reviews.title: ... GIFT BECAUSE I ALREADY HAVE THE SET AND I LOVE IT. I USE IT EVERYTIME I COME
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED FOR GIFT BECAUSE I ALREADY HAVE THE SET AND I LOVE IT. I USE IT EVERYTIME I COME.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Pan started to melt on high heat
customer_reviews.text: The deep pan is not very large and the utensils are flimsy at best. When frying for the first time the oil splattered everywhere and the pan started to melt. Probably partly user error but also scary.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: love pans. but still have to use a little ...
customer_reviews.text: love pans. but still have to use a little oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pans
customer_reviews.text: So far they are great, baked, fried and easy cooking and cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Rusto

customer_reviews.title: Then everything will stick to the pan and good luck cleaning it
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE !!!! These pans will work well for about 4 to 5 months. After that, the ceramic coating or whatever the coating is will start to wear off. Then everything will stick to the pan and good luck cleaning it. The company's response is to soak it in hot water and that will loosen it up so you can scrub the pan. When I asked for a refund or replacement, they just referred me back to Amazon and they reminded me that there is a 60 day limited warranty. So much for the "MAGIC CHEF". DON'T BUY IT !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Horrible pot & pan!!! Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother waisting your money on there. Got them on a Amazon deal for $69 and that was in December 2016. Returns ended for this product on Jan 31, 2017. Guess what is chipping... my brand new pans. I have always kept close care of them. Not using anything that would scratch. Hand washing and drying then put away. I am not happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: bad bad hate it very much
customer_reviews.text: bad bad hate it very much, not as large as show in adds on TV. I should have returned it back didn't want go through the hassle. Will not ever order anything of this likeness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best cookware I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking with Cooper Chef pans. Nothing sticks to them and you can get them hotter than normal cookware.
customer_reviews.author: P. McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Even though we used the pan as directed, after only 2 months (it was a gift) it sticks and everything burns. The pan is not scratched, but the food doesn't heat even and sticks.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Best pan set we’ve bought in a while
customer_reviews.text: Don’t know what it is about this set but they’re the best pans we’ve bought in a while
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Perez

customer_reviews.title: Non stick
customer_reviews.text: Please purchase these pans they are so unbelievably awesome. Nothing sticks and clean up is like nothing you will ever see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A somewhat sticky situation
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product performed at a mediocre level. The product does have a non-stick surface but food will stick to it at times. This makes it difficult to clean after making certain meals. The product is not very substantial either. I was surprised at how flimsy the sidewalls of the pot were. The product works but it is not nearly as nice as they show on the infomercials. I would not recommend purchasing this product as it does not provide the value that it claims.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well - The pans are not flat on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks well - The pans are not flat on the bottom so cooking eggs they slide to the corners. The copper color is coming off but cooks other things satisfactory!
customer_reviews.author: Evelina Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from this product, do not buy! Worked great for about 2 weeks then everything sticks to it, does not work as advertised and is far too expensive for pans.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I received this on time but I'm unhappy that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this on time but I'm unhappy that I only received the big pan with the lid and a rack. I am missing the other pan and the utensils. Should have been a 6 piece set as described on my box, and not a 1 piece as I recieved. Please send me the rest of the items that were missing. I don't want a refund I just want the rest of the stuff. This was a gift to my mother Claude
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Never buying it again
customer_reviews.text: Try this thing don’t trust The commercials on the TV they’re all liars they want to make money out of us after using three or four times this is what I got and I’m never gonna trust this commercials on TV ever again zero out of 10 from me thank you so much copper making my money worth nothing thank you so much Amazon too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ramandeep singh

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans.
customer_reviews.text: love these pans! We use only butter in it with whatever we cook. We are careful not to use anything that will scratch the surface. The large pan is great for making soup.
customer_reviews.author: My Review

customer_reviews.title: I loved this pan for the first few uses
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pan for the first few uses. After that non-stick could not be further from the truth. More like extra stick. Perhaps my pan was faulty, but by the time I used it and it malfunctioned I was no longer eligible for a return. So now I have a $100 pan that is unusable. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Clariss Saraf

customer_reviews.title: Copper Chef #2 wife and cooking #1
customer_reviews.text: It was for my wife, she is very happy and so am I. Great cooking, love the food that she continue to make. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell B.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my son in law. He's really likes it. You can fry bake and use it as a deep fryer. Really easy to clean. Great product will definitely buy other products.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: non stick coating failing
customer_reviews.text: Both of the large pans were non-stick and easy to clean for about 2 months but now a year and a half later they are not as easy to clean. Also the coating scratches much easier.
customer_reviews.author: William H Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product, not sure what we did before it
customer_reviews.author: ohiohon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Christmas gift for my dad. He loves Copper Chef everything! I watched him cook Christmas dinner with them and nothing stuck to the pans. Super easy to clean. I’m planning on reordering another set for myself. Would definitely recommend to everyone. Everything shipped very quickly and on time. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Excellent non-stick but bottom coat rubbing off
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this copper cookware works--it delivers what it promises in terms of being absolutely non-stick. There is just one problem. I have a gas stove, and the iron grates are rubbing off the apparently thin copper coating on the bottom of the pans. If you have a glass surface cooktop you will be fine!
customer_reviews.author: The Cheshire Cat

customer_reviews.title: These fryers are awesome, if you need the utensils
customer_reviews.text: These fryers are awesome, if you need the utensils, great, if not, not bad for spares. They cook great and their clean-up is even better, just remember not to use any grease, oils, or sprays.
customer_reviews.author: TheYeti

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: These pan are the worst , you cant use certain oils they are very time consuming to get clean. they SIT!
customer_reviews.author: Duer’s RV Rentals

customer_reviews.title: 5 Piece Copper Chef Pans
customer_reviews.text: Like the pans-so far...they've worked well and clean up like a breeze. Purchased to use on Induction cook-top....this I'm looking forward to!! The cast iron pans required to use on cook-top weigh a ton-these pans should make a great replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Granny B

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE !!  I CANT BELIEVE I WASTE $105.00 IN A CRAPPY WHOLE SET OF PANS . MAD !!!
customer_reviews.text: At the begging is non stick !! , but after 10 times used you will get in to a sticky situation. Even butter cant help!! Still useful, my wife hit me on the head when I get drunk and late at night !!! SPEND YOUR MONEY IN SOMETHING ELSE. STAYING WITH TEFLON.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: IT WILL SCRATCH REGARDLESS OF HOW HARD YOU TRY
customer_reviews.text: I ignored all bad reviews that I read online and choose to try it myself. Regardless of how much you follow instructions to prevent it from getting scratched, it will still scratch from outside. The reason for the scratch is nothing you did wrong. It just sits on the burner and when you cook and move it around, it will scratch. I also hate the fact that it is square and the handle come right into your stomach when you cook. I want the handle to be either to the left or right to allow me to easily mix the food. Oh, and food will stick as well even if you add oil.
customer_reviews.author: Ehab Aref

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not usually a good reviewer for this sort of purchase--but these pans are worth it. no sticking, easy clean. I find them to exceed the advertisement. I'm very happy I bought these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Clint B

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong item and it was already opened
customer_reviews.text: I received a 5-piece set that only had 1 pan and no utensils. The package looked rough like it had been handled quite a bit and the tape on it was already cut open. The lid and pan had hand prints all over it already.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PANS !!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SET !! Now my favorite pans !! No stick, very versatile, easy to clean. Good quality and reasonable price. Love them !!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first few times we used them and after that everything stuck..
customer_reviews.author: leetha pitts

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my Copper Chef and it was scraped in the inside. I have never used this product and it's already damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Not what I really expcted
customer_reviews.text: They are really "light", copper finishes scratches easily. I would not order if I knew this. They are good for nonstick cooking, but just wonder how long they will look "nice & coppery" with use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans, price is right, purchased these for my daughter and she loves the easy clean up of thes pans
customer_reviews.author: Rosielocks

customer_reviews.title: This pan is outstanding i love it will be ordering bigger pans it works i ...
customer_reviews.text: This pan is outstanding i love it will be ordering bigger pans it works i mean absolutely no sticking nothing sticks to it. i do suggest every house obtain one.

customer_reviews.title: happy wife happy
customer_reviews.text: she wanted this, she got it. happy wife happy life

customer_reviews.title: Faster Cooking and Easy Cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very nice assortment. Works just as well in your own kitchen as it does on infomercials which is a rare treat!
customer_reviews.author: Mothra

customer_reviews.title: Loved these pan
customer_reviews.text: Loved these pan, nothing sticks. I cook everything in these pots. I did find that if you want something to brown nicely you do need little oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Greene

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Pans stick
customer_reviews.text: One of the two pans has been sticking for the past month. Exactly after 1 year of use. We care for both and used them as directed/ indicated and yet, any and every food sticks on it, regardless of the cooking temperature. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product does not include the frying pan as stated in description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These pans are garbage!!
customer_reviews.text: These pans warped after just a few uses. These pans are garbage!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Dziergas

customer_reviews.title: ... only used the pans a few times but I love them. I haven't used the fryer basket yet ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the pans a few times but I love them. I haven't used the fryer basket yet but I will and I will let you know about that. I would definitely recommend them. Make sure you read the care directions before use. Very happy with purchase. Would order other products. ☺☺☺
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: The "Stuckiest"!!
customer_reviews.text: Recent reviews are totally true! Nonstick stops working after a few months of use. Yes, you could still use with PAM or other cooking fat, but you could do that with any pot...although the egg I had this morning was way more "stuck" than any other uncoated pan I've ever used. Shame on us "early-adopters." No wonder you don't see at Costco...they usually do a terrific job of vetting products like this. Amazon, please take note.
customer_reviews.author: RON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Iy has been a great present for my Mom. Price was great.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but I would not buy again

customer_reviews.title: WORKS BETTER THAN YOU WOULD THINK
customer_reviews.text: JUST AS THE REST OF THESE I HAVE PERFECTO,WORKS BETTER THAN YOU WOULD THINK.
customer_reviews.author: larry a willman

customer_reviews.title: If it looks too good to be true then it is.
customer_reviews.text: Had about a year and the smaller fry pan is terrible. Everything sticks to it. The larger pan is still good. But for the price it is a big let down. I loved it at first although it never cooked like on the infomerical.
customer_reviews.author: amy leigh  ciskowski

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I little less substantial than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Joginder Manhas

customer_reviews.title: See all reviews not just the first ones.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the first 20 meals. After that the non-stick isn't non-stick anymore.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Mom for Christmas, she loves them. I'm quite amazed at them too. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie D

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as expected
customer_reviews.text: My sister ordered hers from TV and holds much more. This is a smaller version.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best pan in the entire world. I'll buy this pan over and over and over again

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. especially scrarmbled eggs. Its almost like I can actually cook. well I wont go quite that far...

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. They are great skillets to use every ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They are great skillets to use every day for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Riser

customer_reviews.title: The pan got scratched by a plastic slotted Turner. ...
customer_reviews.text: The pan got scratched by a plastic slotted turner. It is non-stick and works well...at least it did until before the scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on sale fo $69. Got the utensils, the fry pan with shorter walls, and the deep dry pan. That's right, came with 2 pans and the utensils even though the listing only shows 1 pan. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tristar 5 Piece copper pan set
customer_reviews.text: Lighter construction than expected. Wife likes it. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bill76-69

product_meta.title: Copper Chef 10 Piece Cookware Set - 9.5 Inches Deep Square Pan & Frying Pan, Includes Fry Basket, Steamer Rack, Utensil Set and Recipe Book
product_meta.description:
Size:10 PiecesPresenting the revolutionary way of cooking delicious, gourmet, healthy and hassle-free food in the 21st century!

Enjoy a Healthier Alternative to Daily Cooking.
The Copper cookware with its unbelievable non stick ceramic coating makes frying or sauteing perfect for healthier foods cooked with minimal oil, while preserving taste.

The non-stick cerami-tech coating combined with the induction bottom distributes high heat quickly and evenly to the entire cooking surface to perfect steaks, vegetables, omelettes, pancakes and more. 

The 10 pieces cookware set works in your oven as well, sear a steak on your stove top, then bake to your desired degree of doneness – all in the same pan. 


Package Includes-
1. 9.5” Deep Square Pan
2. 9.5” Square Fry Pan
3. Tempered Glass Lid
4. Fry Basket
5. Steamer
6. Spatula
7. Pasta Fork
8. Sauce Skimmer
9. Stirring spoon
10. Bonus Cookbook by the culinary expert Eric Theiss

Boost your cooking with more productivity in the kitchen – hassle-free! Better looking and tasting food – every time!

Why did we Sell Over 1 Million Pans Already?
- Non-Stick Cooking Surface
- 5 Layer Construction
- ECO-FRIENDLY MATERIALS-100% PFOS, PTFE and PFOA-free
- Fan, gas oven or grills can withstand temperatures up to 850°F
- Stainless Steel Induction Plate which Distributes High Heat Quickly
- Ergonomically Shaped Metal Handles
- Dishwasher Safe

Whether cooking a simple dinner for your family or hosting friends, Copper Chef will make cooking a cinch.

Mouthwatering, gourmet-style cooking with minimum effort – at your fingertips!

So... Why wait?
feature_bullets: THE BEST FIND FOR ALL KITCHENS – Copper-colored fry pan set with non-stick Cerami-Tech Ceramic coating that does not require the use of oil, butter, or grease. Cook all your favorite foods, healthily and easily on any surface: gas, electric, glass, ceramics, or induction cooktops. It may also be placed into the oven, as it is heat resistant up to 850° F. The latest Cerami-Tech coating technology and a stainless steel induction plate in the bottom of skillets allows heat distribute more evenly and effectively which provides faster cooking.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL MODERN DESIGN - Frypan along with cooking utensils in the kit can serve as a decent replacement for your multiple pots and kitchenware, like wok, baking dish, roasting pan, rice cooker, steamer and stock pot. Square form allows for a 25% larger cooking space compared to an ordinary round saucepan.

ENDLESS COOKING POSSIBILITIES - Copper Chef scratch resistant cookware set provides reliable assistance in preparing a full menu for any special occasion; it’s good for everything from soups to stews to main dishes and desserts. Use it for everyday cooking, make the recipes you love the most for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Cook eggs, omelette, pasta, french fries, chicken nuggets & wings, pizza, French toast, doughnuts, pancakes, cake, pie and many more delicious foods. Fry, boil, steamed and bake fish, meat or vegetables.

SAFE AND EASY TO CLEAN - Copper Chef non stick frying pans and cooking accessories are nontoxic and free of both PTFE & PFOA, making them completely safe for kids and adults alike. Effortless cooking is followed by even easier cleaning. It can be washed by hand with water, a mild soap, and a soft, nonmetallic scrubber or sponge or, in the dishwasher. Unlike traditional copper pans, Copper Chef aluminum fry pans with CeramiTech outer layer do not require frequent polishing as coat will not oxidize or tarnish.

PACKAGE INCLUDES - 9.5 inches deep square pan, 9.5 inch square fry pan, tempered glass lid, fry basket, steamer rack & cutlery set with non-stick slotted spatula, pasta fork, sauce skimmer, and stirring spoon. + a bonus cookbook from the culinary expert Eric Theiss. The ultimate set to use at home, dorm or RV. Although frypans are designed for kitchen use they may come in handy for camping.
